description: Numbers n such that n and 8n + 3 are both prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: a := proc (n) if isprime(n) = true and isprime(8*n+3) = true then n else end if end proc: seq(a(n), n = 1 .. 900); # _Emeric Deutsch_, Dec 26 2008
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in PrimesUpTo(1000) | IsPrime(8*n+3)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010
author: _David W. Wilson_
